products.title: Electric Blackout Titan Warm Stone Roller Blind
products.description: Warm by name and cosy by design, the rustic shade and simplicity of this roller make it an ideal choice for all manner of design schemes. Itll harmonise particularly well with other earthy, natural tones, and looks sublime when used to add warmth to a cool, white-themed space.

products.title: Voile FR Moondust Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark grey electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their voile moondust grey electric roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A grey electric roller blind easily updates the space, and their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This light grey blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, a great option for hot offices or sunrooms.

products.title: Mood FR Voile Cosmic Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. As this is flame-retardant this makes this sheer electric roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey electric roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Whitby Blackout PVC Stone Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen, a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.
